# dataBecameReady

**Type Property**

A notification the system posts when a sample buffer’s data becomes ready.

## Declaration

```swift
static let dataBecameReady: NSNotification.Name
```

## Notifications

- **dataFailed**: A notification the system posts when a sample buffer fails to load its data.
